item.name: Reset a user's password using a password reset token

urlencoded.value: A role which should be given to very important people.
A permission which should be given to very important people.

response.name: /api/oauth/authorize
response.body:

request.description:
This request will pass a 'Location' header with the value of the 'redirect_uri.'
The link will contain the authorization code required for converting authorization codes into access tokens.
This request can fail in postman as the returned response is a redirect which cannot be performed in postman.

item.name: Retrieve all of the access scopes
Convert authorization code to an access token
Retrieve the authenticated user's personal access tokens
Retrieve a specified user's personal access tokens
